## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-834">Azure SA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-834">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-835">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-835">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-836">字符串 "sig"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-836">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-837">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-837">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-838">字符串 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-838">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-839">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-839">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-840">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-840">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-841">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-841">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-842">介于43-53 个字符和小写字母、数字或百分号 (% ) 之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-842">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-843">字符串 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-843">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-844">不是字母或数字的小写字母、数字或百分号 (% ) 的任意字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-844">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-845">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-846">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-846">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-847">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-848">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-848">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-849">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-849">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-889">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-889">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-890">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-890">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-891">字符串 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-891">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-892">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-892">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-893">字符串 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-893">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-894">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-894">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-895">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-895">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-896">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-896">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-897">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-897">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-898">字符串 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-898">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-899">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-899">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-900">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-900">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-901">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-902">86个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-902">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-903">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-903">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-904">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-904">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-905">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-905">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-906">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-906">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-907">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-907">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-908">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-908">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-909">正则表达式 **CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-909">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-910">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-910">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-928"> (通用) 的 Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-928">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-929">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-929">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-930">86的任意组合（以小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) ，在下面的模式中所列字符的前面或后面）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-930">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-931">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-931">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-932">0到大于号之一 ( # A0) 、撇号 ( ' ) 、等号 (=) 、引号 ( ") 或数字标记 ( # ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-932">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-933">86个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-933">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-934">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-934">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-935">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-935">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-936">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-936">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-937">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-937">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-938">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-938">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-939">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-939">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-940">比利时驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-940">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-941">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-941">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-942">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-942">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-943">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-943">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-944">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-944">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-945">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-945">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-946">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-946">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-947">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-947">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-948">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-949">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-949">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-950">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-950">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-951">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-951">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-973">比利时国家/地区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-973">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-974">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-975">11位数加上可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-975">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-976">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-977">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-977">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-978">6个数字和两个可选句点（以 YY 为格式）。月.DD 出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-978">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-979">点、短划线、空间中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-979">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-980">奇数的三个连续数字 (奇数，即使偶数) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-980">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-981">点、短划线、空间中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-981">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-982">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-982">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-983">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-983">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-984">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-984">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-985">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-985">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-986">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-986">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-987">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-987">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-988">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-988">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-989">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-989">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-990">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-990">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-991">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-991">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-992">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-992">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1051">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1051">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1052">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1052">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1053">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1054">两个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1054">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1055">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1055">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1056">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1056">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1057">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1057">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1058">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1058">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1059">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1059">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1060">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1060">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1061">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1061">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1062">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1062">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1072">比利时社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1072">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1073">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1073">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1074">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1074">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1075">11位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1075">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1076">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1076">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1077">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1077">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1078">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1078">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1079">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1079">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1080">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1080">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1081">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1081">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1082">函数  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1082">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1083">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1083">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1084">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1085">函数  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1085">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1105">比利时增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1105">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1106">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1106">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1107">12个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1107">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1108">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1108">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1109">12个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1109">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1110">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1110">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1111">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1111">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1112">数字0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1112">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1113">一个从1到9的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1113">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1114">一个可选的点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1114">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1115">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1116">一个可选的点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1116">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1117">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1117">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1118">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1119">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1119">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1120">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1121">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1121">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1122">函数 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1122">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1123">找到 Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1123">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1124">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1125">函数 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1125">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1126">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1126">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1127">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1127">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1128">n º tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1128">nº tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1129">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1129">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1130">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1130">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1131">numéro。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1131">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1132">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1132">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1133">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1133">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1134">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1134">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1135">btw#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1135">btw#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1136">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1136">vat#</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1137">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1137">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1138">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1138">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1139">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1139">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1140">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1140">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1141">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1141">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1142">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1142">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1143">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1143">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1144">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1144">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1145">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1145">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1146">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1146">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1147">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1147">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1148">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1148">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1149">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1149">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1150">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1150">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1151">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1152">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1152">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1153">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1154">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1154">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1155">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1155">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1156">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1156">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1157">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1157">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1158">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1158">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1159">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1159">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1160">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1160">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1172">巴西法人编号 (CNPJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1172">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1173">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1174">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1174">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1175">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1176">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1176">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1177">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1177">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1178">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1178">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1179">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1179">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1180">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1180">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1181">三个数字 (这些前八位数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1181">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1182">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1182">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1183">四位数的分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1183">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1184">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1184">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1185">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1185">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1186">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1186">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1187">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1187">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1188">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1188">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1189">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1189">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1190">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1190">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1191">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1191">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1192">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1192">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1193">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1193">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1194">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1194">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1195">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1195">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1196">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1196">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1197">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1197">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1198">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1198">CNPJ</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1199">CNPJ/MF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1199">CNPJ/MF</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1200">CNPJ-MF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1200">CNPJ-MF</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1201">National Registry of Legal Entities</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1201">National Registry of Legal Entities</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1202">Taxpayers Registry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1202">Taxpayers Registry</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1203">Legal entity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1203">Legal entity</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1204">Legal entities</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1204">Legal entities</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1205">Registration Status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1205">Registration Status</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1206">商业版</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1206">Business</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1207">Company</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1207">Company</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1208">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1208">CNPJ</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1217">巴西国家标识卡 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1217">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1218">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1218">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1219">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1219">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1220">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1220">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1221">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1221">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1222">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1222">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1223">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1223">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1224">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1224">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1225">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1225">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1226">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1226">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1227">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1227">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1228">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1228">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1229">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1229">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1230">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1230">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1231">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1231">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1232">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1232">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1233">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1233">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1234">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1235">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1235">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1236">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1237">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1237">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1238">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1238">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1239">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1239">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1240">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1240">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1241">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1241">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1242">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1242">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1243">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1243">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1245">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1245">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1246">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1246">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1247">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1247">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1248">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1248">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1249">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1249">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1250">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1250">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1251">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1251">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1252">RG（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1252">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1253">RIC（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1253">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1254">保加利亚驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1254">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1255">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1255">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1256">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1256">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1257">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1257">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1258">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1259">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1259">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1260">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1260">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1261">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1261">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1262">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1262">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1263">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1263">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1264">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1264">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1265">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1265">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1284">保加利亚统一民事号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1284">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1285">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1286">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1286">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1287">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1288">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1288">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1289">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1289">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1290">与出生顺序对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1290">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1291">与性别对应的一位数字：男的偶数位和用于女的奇数位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1291">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1292">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1292">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1293">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1294">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1294">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1295">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1296">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1296">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1297">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1297">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1298">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1298">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1299">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1300">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1300">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1310">identification number</span></span>

national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1311">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1312">国家/地区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1312">national number</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1345">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1345">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1346">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1346">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1347">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1347">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1348">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1348">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1349">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1349">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1350">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1350">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1351">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1351">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1352">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1352">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1353">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1353">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1354">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1354">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1355">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1355">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1356">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1356">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1357">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1357">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1358">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1358">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1359">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1359">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1360">保加利亚语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1360">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1361">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1361">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1362">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1362">номер на паспорта</span></span>


## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1363">加拿大银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1363">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1364">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1365">七个或十二个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1365">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1366">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1367">加拿大银行帐号是七个或十二个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1367">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1368">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1368">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1369">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1369">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1370">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1370">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1371">三位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1371">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1372">零 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1372">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1373">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1373">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1374">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1375">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1375">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1376">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1377">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1377">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1378">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1378">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1379">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1379">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1380">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1380">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1381">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1381">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1382">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1382">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1383">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1383">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1407">加拿大驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1407">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1408">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1409">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1409">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1410">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1411">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1411">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1412">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1413">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1413">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1414">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1415">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1415">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1416">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1416">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1417">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1417">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1418">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1418">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1554">加拿大运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1554">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1555">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1555">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1556">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1556">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1557">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1557">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1558">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1558">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1559">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1560">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1560">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1561">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1562">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1562">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1563">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1563">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1564">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1564">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1576">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1576">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1577">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1578">两个大写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1578">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1579">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1580">两个大写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1580">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1581">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1582">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1582">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1583">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1584">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1584">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1585">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1585">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1586">找到 Keyword_canada_passport_number 或 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1586">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1616">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1616">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1617">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1617">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1618">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1618">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1619">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1619">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1620">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1620">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1621">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1621">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1622">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1622">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1623">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1623">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1624">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1624">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1625">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1625">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1626">找到 Keyword_canada_phin 或 Keyword_canada_provinces 中至少有两个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1626">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1659">加拿大社会保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1659">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1660">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1661">9个数字，带可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1661">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1662">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1663">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1663">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1664">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1664">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1665">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1665">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1666">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1666">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1667">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1667">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1668">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1668">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1669">未格式化：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1669">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1670">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1671">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1671">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1672">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1673">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1674">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1674">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1675">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1675">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1676">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1676">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1677">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1677">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1678">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1678">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1679">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1679">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1680">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1680">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1681">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1681">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1682">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1682">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1683">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1683">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1708">智利标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1708">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1709">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1709">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1710">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个校验位或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1710">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1711">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1711">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1712">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1712">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1713">一到两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1713">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1714">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1714">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1715">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1715">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1716">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1716">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1717">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1717">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1718">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1718">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1719">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 这是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1719">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1720">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1720">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1721">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1721">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-1722">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1722">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1723">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1723">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1724">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1724">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1725">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1725">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1726">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1726">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-1727">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1727">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1728">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1728">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1729">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1729">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1735">Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1735">Identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1736">Rol Único Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1736">Rol Único Nacional</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1737">以</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1737">RUN</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-1739">墨守成规</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-1739">RUT</span></span>
