## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-2754">EU 借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2754">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-2755">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-2756">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2756">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-2757">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2757">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-2758">非常复杂且强大的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2758">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-2759">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2759">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-2760">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2760">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-2761">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2761">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-2762">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2762">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-2763">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2763">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-2764">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2764">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-2765">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2765">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-2766">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2766">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-2767">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2767">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-2768">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2768">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-2769">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2769">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-2770">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-2770">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3216">芬兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3216">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3217">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3217">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3218">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3218">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3219">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3219">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3220">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3220">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3221">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3221">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3222">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3222">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3223">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3223">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3224">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3224">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3225">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3225">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3226">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3226">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3227">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3227">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3228">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3228">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3229">正则表达式  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3229">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3230">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3230">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3235">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3235">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3236">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3236">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3237">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3237">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3242">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3242">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3243">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3243">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3244">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3244">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3246">芬兰欧洲健康保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3246">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3247">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3247">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3248">20位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3248">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3249">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3249">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3250">20位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3250">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3251">10位数-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3251">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3252">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3252">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3253">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3253">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3254">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3254">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3255">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3255">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3256">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3256">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3257">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3257">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3258">正则表达式 Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3258">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3259">找到 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3259">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3265">finska sjukförsäkringskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3265">finska sjukförsäkringskort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3266">运行状况卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3266">health card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3267">健康保险卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3267">health insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3268">健康保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3268">health insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3269">hälsokort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3269">hälsokort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3270">sairaanhoitokortin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3270">sairaanhoitokortin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3274">sjukförsäkringskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3274">sjukförsäkringskort</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3277">芬兰国家/地区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3277">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3278">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3278">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3279">6个数字加上一个字符，表示一个世纪加上三个数字加上校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3279">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3280">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3280">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3281">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3281">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3282">6位数，格式格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3282">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3283">世纪标记 (是 "-"、"+" 或 "a" ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3283">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3284">三位数的个人标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3284">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3285">不区分大小写的数字或字母 () 是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3285">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3286">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3286">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3287">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3287">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3288">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3288">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3289">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3289">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3290">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3290">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3291">找到 Keyword_finnish_national_id 中的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3291">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3292">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3292">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3293">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3293">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3294">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3294">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3295">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3295">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3344">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3344">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3345">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3345">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3346">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3346">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3347">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3347">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3348">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3348">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3349">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3349">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3350">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3350">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3351">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3351">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3352">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3353">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3354">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3355">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3355">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3356">正则表达式 Regex_finland_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3356">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3357">找到 Keyword_finland_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3357">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3358">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3358">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3359">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3359">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3360">登记卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3360">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3361">Passi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3361">Passi</span></span>


## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3362">芬兰社会保障号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3362">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3363">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3363">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3364">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3365">指定格式的11个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3365">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3366">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3367">指定格式的11个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3367">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3368">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3368">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3369">以下任一实例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3369">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3370">加号符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3370">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3371">负号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3371">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3372">字母 "A" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3372">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3373">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3373">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3374">一个字母或一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3374">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3375">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3375">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3376">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3376">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3377">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3377">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3378">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3378">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3379">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3379">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3380">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3380">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3381">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3381">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3382">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3382">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3406">法国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3406">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3407">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3407">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3408">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3409">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3409">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3410">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3411">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3411">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3412">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3413">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3413">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3414">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3415">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3415">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3416">函数 Func_french_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3416">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3417">至少满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3417">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3418">找到 Keyword_french_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3418">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3419">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3419">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3424">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3424">driving licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3425">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3425">driving license</span></span>

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3431">法国健康保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3431">France health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3432">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3432">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3433">21位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3433">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3434">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3434">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3435">21位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3435">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3436">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3436">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3437">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3437">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3438">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3438">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3439">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3439">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3440">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3440">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3441">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3441">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3442">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3442">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3443">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3443">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3444">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3444">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3445">正则表达式 Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3445">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3446">找到 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3446">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3447">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3447">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3448">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3448">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3449">保险卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3449">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3450">vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3450">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3451">d'assuré社交</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3451">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3452">法国国家 id 卡片 (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3452">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3453">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3453">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3454">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3454">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3455">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3455">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3456">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3456">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3457">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3458">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3458">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3459">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3460">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3460">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3461">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3461">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3462">找到 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3462">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3465">card number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3465">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3467">nationale d'idenite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3467">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3468">cni#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3468">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3469">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3469">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3470">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3470">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3471">国家/地区标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3471">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3472">国家标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3472">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3473">nationalidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3473">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3474">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3474">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3475">numéro 的反 vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3475">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3476">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3476">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3477">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3477">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3478">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3479">9个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3479">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3480">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3481">9个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3481">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3482">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3482">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3483">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3483">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3484">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3484">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3485">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3485">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3486">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3486">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3487">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3487">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3488">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3488">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3489">函数 Func_fr_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3489">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3490">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3490">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3498">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3498">Passportno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3500">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3500">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3501">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3501">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3502">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3502">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3503">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3503">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3504">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3504">Numéro de passeport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3508">Passeport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3508">Passeport#</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3511">法国社会保障号 (INSEE) 或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3511">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3512">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号和等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3512">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3513">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3514">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3514">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3515">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3516">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3516">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3517">13位数，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3517">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3518">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3518">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3519">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3519">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3520">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3521">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3521">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3522">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3523">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3523">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3524">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3524">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3525">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3525">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3526">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3526">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3527">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3527">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3528">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3528">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3529">未找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3529">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3530">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3530">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3556">法国纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3556">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3557">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3558">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3558">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3559">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3560">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3560">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3561">一个数字，必须为0、1、2或3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3561">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3562">1位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3562">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3563">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3563">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3564">2位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3564">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3565">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3565">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3566">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3566">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3567">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3567">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3568">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3568">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3569">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3569">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3570">3个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3570">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3571">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3571">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3572">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3572">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3573">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3573">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3574">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3574">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3575">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3575">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3576">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3576">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3577">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3577">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3578">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3578">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3582">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3583">税号标识编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3583">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3584">税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3584">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3585">免税#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3585">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3588">税务登记编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3588">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3589">taxid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3589">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3590">taxidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3590">taxidno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3592">taxno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3592">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3593">taxnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3593">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3594">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3594">taxnumber</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3598">法国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3598">France value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3599">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3600">13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3600">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3601">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3601">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3602">13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3602">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3603">两个字母-FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3603">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3604">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3604">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3605">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3605">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3606">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3606">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3607">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3607">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3608">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3608">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3609">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3609">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3610">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3610">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3611">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3611">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3612">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3612">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3613">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3613">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3614">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3614">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3615">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3615">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3616">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3616">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3617">找到 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3617">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3618">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3618">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3619">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3619">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3620">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3620">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3621">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3621">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3622">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3622">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3623">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3623">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3624">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3624">vat#</span></span>

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3632">德国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3632">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3633">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3633">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3634">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3634">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3635">11个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3635">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3636">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3636">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3637">11 位数字和字母（不区分大小写）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3637">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3638">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3638">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3639">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3639">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3640">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3640">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3641">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3641">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3642">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3642">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3643">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3643">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3644">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3644">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3645">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3645">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3646">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3646">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3647">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3647">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3648">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3648">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3649">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3649">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3650">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3650">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3651">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3651">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3652">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3652">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3745">德国身份卡片编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3745">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3746">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3747">自2010年11月1日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3747">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3748">从1年4月1987至31年10月2010：10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3748">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3749">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3749">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3750">自2010年11月1日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3750">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3751">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3751">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3752">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3752">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3753">介于1年4月1987至 31 10 月2010：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3753">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3754">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3754">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3755">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3756">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3756">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3757">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3758">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3758">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3759">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3759">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3760">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3760">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3764">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3764">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3765">id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3765">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3766">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3766">identifikation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3768">identity 卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3768">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3769">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3769">identity number</span></span>

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3776">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3776">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3777">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3777">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3778">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3778">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3779">10个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3779">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3780">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3780">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3781">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3781">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3782">第一个字符是数字或从该集合中的字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3782">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3783">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3783">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3784">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3784">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3785">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3785">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3786">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3786">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3787">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3787">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3788">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3788">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3789">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3789">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3790">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3790">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3791">找到以下任意五个关键字列表中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3791">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3792">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3793">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3793">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3794">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3794">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3795">找到以下任意五个关键字列表中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3795">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3796">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3814">德国税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3814">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3815">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3815">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3816">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3816">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3817">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3817">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3818">11位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3818">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3819">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3819">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3820">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3820">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3821">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3821">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3822">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3822">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3823">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3823">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3824">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3824">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3825">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3825">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3826">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3826">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3827">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3827">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3828">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3828">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3829">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3829">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3830">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3830">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3831">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3831">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3832">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3832">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3833">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3833">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3834">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3834">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3835">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3835">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3836">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3836">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3841">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3841">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3842">税号标识编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3842">tax identification no</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3860">德国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3860">Germany value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3861">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3861">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3862">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3862">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3863">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3863">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3864">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3864">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3865">字母 D 或 D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3865">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3866">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3866">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3867">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3867">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3868">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3868">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3869">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3869">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3870">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3870">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3871">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3871">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3872">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3872">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3873">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3874">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3874">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3875">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3876">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3876">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3877">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3877">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3878">找到 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3878">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3879">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3879">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3880">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3880">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3881">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3881">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3882">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3882">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3883">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3883">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3884">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3884">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3885">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3885">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3886">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3886">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3887">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3887">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3888">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3888">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3889">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3889">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3890">希腊驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3890">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3891">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3891">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3892">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3893">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3893">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3894">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3895">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3895">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3896">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3896">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3897">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3897">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3898">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3898">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3899">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3899">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3900">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3900">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3901">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3901">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3907">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3907">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3909">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3909">drivers license</span></span>
