## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3918">希腊国家 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3918">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3919">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3919">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3920">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3920">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3921">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3921">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3922">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3922">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3923">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3923">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3924">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3924">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3925">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3925">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3926">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3926">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3927">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3927">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3928">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3928">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3929">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3929">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3930">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3931">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3931">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3932">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3933">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3933">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3934">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3934">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3935">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3935">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3936">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3936">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3937">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3937">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3939">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3939">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3942">希腊语个人 id 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3942">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3943">希腊警察 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3943">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3944">identity 卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3944">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3945">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3945">tautotita</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3948">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3948">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3949">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3949">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3950">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3951">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3951">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3952">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3952">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3953">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3953">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3954">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3955">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3955">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3956">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3957">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3957">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3958">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3958">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3959">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3959">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3966">希腊税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3966">Greece tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3967">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3968">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3968">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3969">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3970">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3970">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3971">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3971">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3972">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3972">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-3973">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3973">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-3974">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3974">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3975">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3975">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-3976">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-3976">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4005">香港 HKID) 号码的香港身份卡片 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4005">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4006">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4006">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4007">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4007">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4008">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4008">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4009">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4009">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4010">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4010">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4011">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4011">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4012">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4012">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4013">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4013">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4014">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4014">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4015">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4015">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4016">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4016">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4017">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4017">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4018">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4018">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4019">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4019">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4020">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4020">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4021">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4021">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4022">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4022">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4059">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身份証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4059">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身份証</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4060">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4060">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4061">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4061">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span></span>

   
## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4062">匈牙利驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4062">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4063">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4063">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4064">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4065">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4065">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4066">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4067">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4067">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4068">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4068">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4069">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4069">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4070">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4070">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4071">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4071">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4072">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4072">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4073">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4073">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4074">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4074">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4075">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4075">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4091">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4091">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4092">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4093">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4093">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4094">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4094">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4095">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4095">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4096">一种与性别相对应的数字 (1-男、2-女、其他号码也可能适用于在具有双公民的1900或公民之前出生的公民) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4096">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4097">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4097">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4098">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4098">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4099">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4099">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4100">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4100">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4101">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4101">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4102">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4102">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4103">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4103">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4104">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4104">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4105">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4105">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4106">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4106">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4107">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4107">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4111">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4112">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4112">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4113">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4113">sz.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4114">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4114"> ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4115">ig。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4115">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4116">személyazonosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4116">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4117">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4117">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4118">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4118">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4119">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4119">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4120">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4120">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4121">两个字母后跟6个或7个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4121">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4122">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4122">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4123">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4123">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4124">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4125">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4125">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4126">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4127">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4128">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4128">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4129">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4129">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4130">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4130">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4131">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4131">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4132">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4132">passport number</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4136">匈牙利社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4136">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4137">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4137">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4138">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4138">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4139">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4139">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4140">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4140">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4141">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4141">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4142">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4143">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4143">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4144">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4145">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4145">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4146">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4146">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4147">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4147">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4148">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4148">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4149">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4149">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4150">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4150">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4151">Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4151">Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4152">匈牙利语社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4152">hungarian social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4153">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4153">social security number</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4169">匈牙利纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4169">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4170">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4170">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4171">10个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4171">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4172">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4172">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4173">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4173">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4174">一个必须为 "8" 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4174">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4175">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4175">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4176">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4176">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4177">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4177">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4178">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4178">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4179">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4179">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4180">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4180">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4181">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4181">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4182">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4182">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4183">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4183">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4184">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4184">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4210">匈牙利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4210">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4211">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4211">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4212">10个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4212">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4213">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4213">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4214">10个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4214">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4215">2个字母-HU 或 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4215">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4216">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4216">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4217">8位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4217">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4218">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4219">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4219">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4220">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4221">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4221">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4222">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4222">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4223">找到 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4223">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4224">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4224">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4225">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4225">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4239"> (PAN) 的印度永久帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4239">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4240">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4240">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4241">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4241">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4242">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4242">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4243">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4243">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4244">五个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4244">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4245">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4245">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4246">一个字母，是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4246">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4247">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4248">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4248">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4249">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4250">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4250">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4251">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4251">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4252">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4252">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4253">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4253">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4254">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4254">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4255">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4255">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4256">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4256">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4257">蛋糕</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4257">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4258">印度唯一标识 (Aadhaar) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4258">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4259">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4259">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4260">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4260">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4261">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4261">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4262">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4262">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4263">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4263">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4264">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4264">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4265">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4265">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4266">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4266">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4267">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4267">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4268">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4268">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4269">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4269">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4270">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4270">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4271">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4271">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4272">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4272">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4273">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4273">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4274">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4274">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4275">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4276">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4276">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4277">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4277">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4278">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4278">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4279">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4279">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4280">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4280">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4281">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4281">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4282">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4282">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4283">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4283">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4284">印度尼西亚身份卡片 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4284">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4285">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4286">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4286">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4287">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4288">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4288">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4289">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4289">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4290">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4290">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4291">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4291">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4292">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4292">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4293">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4293">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4294">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4294">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4295">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4295">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4296">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4296">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4297">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4298">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4298">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4299">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4300">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4300">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4301">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4301">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4302">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4302">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4303">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4303">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4304">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4304">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4305">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4305">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4306">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4306">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4307">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4307">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4308"> (IBAN) 的国际银行帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4308">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4309">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4309">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4310">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4310">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4311">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4311">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4312">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4312">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4313">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4313">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4314">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4314">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4315">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4315">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4316">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4316">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-p131">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-p131">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4319">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4319">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4320">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4321">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4321">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4322">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4323">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4323">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4324">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4324">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4325">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4325">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4326">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4326">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4327">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4327">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4328">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-10-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4328">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4329">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4330">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4330">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4331">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4332">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4332">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4333">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4333">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4334">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4334">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4335">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4335">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4336">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4336">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4337">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4337">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4338">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4338">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4339">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4339">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4340">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_ 更新的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4340">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4341">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4341">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4342">Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4342">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4343">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4343">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4344">Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4344">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4345">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4345">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4346">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-9-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4346">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4347">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4347">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4348">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4348">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4349">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4349">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4350">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4350">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4351">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4351">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4352">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4352">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4353">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4353">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4354">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4354">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4355">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4355">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4356">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4356">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4357">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4357">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4358">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4358">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4359">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4359">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4360">Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4360">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4361">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4361">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4362">Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4362">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4363">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4363">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4364">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4364">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4365">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4365">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4366">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4366">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4367">解释 IPv4 地址格式化（点）版本或非格式化（没有点）版本的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4367">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4368">Ipv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4368">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4369"> 解释格式化 IPv6 号码（包含冒号）的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4369">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4370">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4370">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4371">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4372">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4372">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4373">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4374">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4374">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4375">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4375">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4376">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4376">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4377">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4377">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4378">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4378">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4379">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4379">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4380">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4380">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4381">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4381">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4382">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4382">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4383">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4383">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4384">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4384">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4385">IP（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4385">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4386">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4386">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4387">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4387">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4388">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4388">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4389">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4389">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4390">爱尔兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4390">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4391">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4391">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4392">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4393">6位数，后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4393">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4394">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4395">6位数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4395">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4396">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4396">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4397">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4397">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4398">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4398">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4399">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4399">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4400">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4400">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4401">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4401">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4402">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4402">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4403">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4403">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4405">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4405">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4416">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4416">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4419">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4419">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4420">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4420">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4421">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4421">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4422">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4422">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4423">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4423">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4424">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4424">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4425">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4425">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4426">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4426">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4427">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4427">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4428">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4428">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4429">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4429">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4430">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4430">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4431">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4431">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4432">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4432">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4433">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4433">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4434">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4434">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4435">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4435">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4436">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4436">irish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4437">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4437">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4438">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4438">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4439">登记卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4439">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4440">passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4440">passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4441">passeport numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4441">passeport numero</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4442">爱尔兰个人公开服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4442">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4443">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4444">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4444">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4445">七位数字后跟1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4445">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4446">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4446">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4447">七位数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4447">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4448">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4448">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4449">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4449">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4450">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4450">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4451">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4451">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4452">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4452">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4453">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4453">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4454">字母 (区分大小写) 这是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4454">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4455">一个-I 范围内的可选字母，或 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4455">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4456">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4457">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4458">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4459">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4459">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4460">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4460">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4461">找到 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4461">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4462">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4462">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4463">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4463">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4464">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4464">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4465">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
