## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4510">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4510">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4511">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4511">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4512">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4512">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4513">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4513">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4514">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4514">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4515">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4515">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4516">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4516">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4517">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4517">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4518">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4518">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4519">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4519">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4520">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4520">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4521">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4521">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4522">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4523">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4523">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4524">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4525">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4525">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4526">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4526">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4527">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4527">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4528">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4528">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4529">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4529">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4530">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4530">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4531">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4531">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4532">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4532">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4533">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4533">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4534">以色列国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4534">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4535">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4536">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4536">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4537">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4538">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4538">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4539">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4540">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4540">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4541">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4542">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4542">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4543">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4543">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4544">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4544">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4545">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4545">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4546">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4546">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4547">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4547">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4548">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4548">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4549">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4549">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4550">意大利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4550">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4551">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4551">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4552">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4553">10个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4553">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4554">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4554">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4555">10个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4555">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4556">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4556">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4557">字母 "A" 或 "V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4557">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4558">七个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字或下划线字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4558">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4559">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4559">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4560">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4560">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4561">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4561">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4562">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4562">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4563">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4563">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4564">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4564">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4565">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4565">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4566">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4566">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4567">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4567">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4568">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4568">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4569">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4569">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4570">意大利会计代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4570">Italy fiscal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4571">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4571">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4572">在指定模式中，由16个字符组成的字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4572">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4573">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4573">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4574">字母和数字的16个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4574">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4575">与系列名称中的前三个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4575">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4576">与名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4576">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4577">与出生年份的最后一个数字对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4577">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4578">一个与出生月份的字母相对应的字母–字母按字母顺序使用，但仅使用字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 和 T (因此，一月为 A，10月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4578">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4579">与出生月份的某一天对应的两个数字，为了区分 genders，40已添加到女性的出生日。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4579">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4580">与特定于 municipality 的区域代码相对应的四个数字，该用户的出生国家 (国家/地区内的代码用于外国国家) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4580">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4581">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4581">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4582">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4582">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4583">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4583">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4584">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4584">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4585">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4585">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4586">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4586">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4587">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4587">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4588">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4588">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4589">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4589">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4624">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4624">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4625">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4625">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4626">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4626">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4627">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4627">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4628">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4628">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4629">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4629">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4630">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4630">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4631">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4631">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4632">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4632">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4633">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4633">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4634">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4634">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4635">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4635">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4636">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4636">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4637">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4637">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4638">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4638">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4639">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4639">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4640">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4640">italian passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4642">passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4642">passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4643">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4643">passaporto italiana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4644">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4644">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4646">passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4646">passaporto numero</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4648">numéro passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4648">numéro passeport</span></span>


## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4649">意大利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4649">Italy value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4650">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4651">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4651">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4652">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4653">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4653">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4654">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4654">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4655">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4655">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4656">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4656">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4657">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4657">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4658">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4659">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4659">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4660">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4661">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4661">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4662">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4662">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4663">找到 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4663">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4664">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4664">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4665">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4665">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4673">日本银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4673">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4674">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4675">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4675">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4676">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4677">银行帐户号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4677">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4678">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4678">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4679">银行帐户分支代码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4679">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4680">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4680">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4681">可选) 的空格或短划线 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4681">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4682">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4682">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4683">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4683">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4684">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4684">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4685">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4685">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4686">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4686">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4687">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4687">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4688">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4688">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4689">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4689">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4690">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4690">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4691">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4691">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4692">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4692">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4693">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4693">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4694">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4694">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4752">Otemachi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4752">Otemachi</span></span>

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4753">日本驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4753">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4754">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4755">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4755">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4756">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4756">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4757">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4757">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4758">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4759">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4759">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4760">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4761">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4761">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4762">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4762">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4763">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4763">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4769">DLS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4769">DLS＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4770">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4770">driver license</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4771">driver licenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4771">driver licenses</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4772">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4772">drivers license</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4791">日本我的号码-公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4791">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4792">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4793">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4793">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4794">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4794">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4795">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4795">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4796">一位数从1到9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4796">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4797">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4797">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4798">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4798">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4799">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4799">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4800">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4800">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4801">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4801">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4802">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4802">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4803">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4803">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4804">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4804">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4805">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4805">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4810">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4810">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4811">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4811">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4812">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4812">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4818">日本我的号码-个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4818">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4819">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4820">12位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4820">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4821">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4822">12位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4822">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4823">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4823">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4824">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4824">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4825">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4825">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4826">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4826">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4827">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4827">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4828">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4829">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4829">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4830">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4831">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4831">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4832">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4832">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4833">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4833">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4834">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4834">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4835">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4835">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4842">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4842">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4843">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4843">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4844">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4844">個人番号カード</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4846">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4846">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4848">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4848">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4849">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4849">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4850">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4850">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4851">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4851">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4852">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4852">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4853">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4853">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4854">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4854">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4855">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4855">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4856">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4856">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4857">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4857">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4858">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4858">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4859">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4859">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4860">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4860">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4861">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4861">パスポート</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4862">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4862">パスポート番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4863">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4863">パスポートのNum</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4864">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4864">パスポート＃</span></span> 

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4865">日本住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4865">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4866">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4866">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4867">12个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4867">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4868">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4868">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4869">12个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4869">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4870">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4870">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4871">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4871">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4872">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4872">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4873">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4874">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4875">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4876">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4876">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4877">正则表达式 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4877">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4878">找到 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4878">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4879">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4879">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4880">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4880">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4881">住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4881">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4882">住宅卡编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4882">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4883">住宅卡片#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4883">Residence card #</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4885">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4885">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4886">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4886">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4887">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4887">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4888">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4888">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4889">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4889">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4890">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4891">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4891">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4892">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4893">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4893">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4894">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4894">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4895">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4895">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4900">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4900">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4901">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4901">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4902">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4902">Resident Register No.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4905">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4905">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4907">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4907">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4908">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4908">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span></span> 

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4909">日本社会保险号 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4909">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4910">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4910">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4911">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4911">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4912">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4912">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4913">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4913">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4914">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4914">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4915">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4915">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4916">六位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4916">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4917">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4917">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4918">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4918">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4919">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4919">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4920">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4920">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4921">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4921">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4922">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4922">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4923">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4923">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4924">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4924">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4925">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4925">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4926">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4926">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4927">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4927">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4928">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4928">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4929">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4929">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4930">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4930">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4931">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4931">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4932">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4932">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4933">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4933">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4934">拉脱维亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4934">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4935">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4935">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4936">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4936">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4937">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4937">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4938">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4938">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4939">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4939">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4940">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4940">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4941">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4941">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4942">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4943">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4943">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4944">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4945">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4945">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4946">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4946">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4947">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4947">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4953">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4953">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4955">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4955">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4959">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4959">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4960">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4960">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4961">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4961">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4963">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4963">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4964">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4964">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4965">11个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4965">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4966">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4966">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4967">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4967">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4968">11个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4968">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4969">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4969">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4970">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4970">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4971">一个数字，对应于19世纪的出生世纪 ( "0"，"1" 表示20世纪，"2" 表示21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4971">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4972">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4972">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4973">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4973">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4974">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4974">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4975">两位数 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4975">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4976">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4976">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4977">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4977">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4978">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4978">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-4979">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4979">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4980">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4980">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4981">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4981">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4982">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4982">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-4983">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4983">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-4984">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-4984">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5047">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5047">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5048">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5048">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5049">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5049">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5050">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5050">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5051">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5051">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5052">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5052">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5053">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5053">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5054">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5054">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5055">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5055">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5056">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5056">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5057">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5057">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5058">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5058">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5059">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5059">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5060">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5060">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5063">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5063">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5064">拉脱维亚语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5064">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5065">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5065">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5066">pase numurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5066">pase numurs</span></span>    


## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5067">立陶宛驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5067">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5068">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5068">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5069">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5069">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5070">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5070">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5071">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5071">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5072">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5072">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5073">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5073">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5074">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5074">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5075">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5075">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5076">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5076">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5077">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5077">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5078">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5078">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5085">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5085">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5090">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5090">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5091">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5091">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5092">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5092">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5093">vairuotojo pažymėjimas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5093">vairuotojo pažymėjimas</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5094">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5094">Lithuania personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5095">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5096">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5096">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5097">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5097">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5098">11个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5098">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5099">一种数字 (1-6) ，对应于个人的性别和出生世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5099">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5100">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5100">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5101">与出生日期的序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5101">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5102">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5102">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5103">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5103">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5104">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5104">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5105">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5105">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5106">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5106">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5107">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5107">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5108">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5108">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5109">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5109">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5110">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5110">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5145">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5145">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5146">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5146">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5147">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5148">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5148">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5149">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5150">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5150">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5151">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5152">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5152">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5153">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5154">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5154">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5155">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5155">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5156">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5156">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5157">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5157">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5158">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5158">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5163">Luxemburg 驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5163">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5164">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5164">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5165">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5165">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5166">6位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5166">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5167">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5167">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5168">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5168">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5169">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5170">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5171">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5172">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5172">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5173">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5173">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5174">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5174">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5181">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5181">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5187">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5187">driving license number</span></span>
