## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5190">Luxemburg (自然个人的国家标识号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5190">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5191">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5192">13个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5192">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5193">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5194">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5194">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5195">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5195">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5196">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5196">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5197">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5197">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5198">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5198">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5199">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5199">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5200">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5200">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5201">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5201">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5202">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5202">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5203">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5203">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5204">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5204">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5227">Luxemburg 护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5227">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5228">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5228">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5229">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5230">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5230">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5231">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5232">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5232">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5233">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5234">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5234">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5235">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5236">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5236">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5237">正则表达式  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5237">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5238">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5238">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5245">Luxemburg 国内标识号 (非自然个人) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5245">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5246">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5246">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5247">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5247">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5248">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5248">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5249">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5249">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5250">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5250">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5251">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5251">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5252">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5252">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5253">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5253">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5254">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5254">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5255">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5255">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5256">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5256">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5257">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5257">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5258">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5258">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5259">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5259">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5260">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5260">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5261">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5261">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5262">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5262">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5263">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5263">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5264">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5264">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5265">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5265">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5305">马来西亚标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5305">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5306">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5307">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5307">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5308">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5309">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5309">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5310">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5310">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5311">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5311">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5312">两个字母的出生位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5312">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5313">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5313">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5314">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5314">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5315">一位数的性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5315">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5316">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5316">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5317">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5317">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5318">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5318">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5319">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5319">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5320">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5320">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5321">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5321">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5348">马耳他驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5348">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5349">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5349">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5350">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5350">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5351">两个字符与指定模式中的六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5351">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5352">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5352">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5353">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5353">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5354">两个字符 (数字或字母，而不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5354">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5355">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5355">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5356">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5356">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5357">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5357">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5358">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5358">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5359">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5360">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5360">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5361">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5362">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5362">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5363">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5363">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5364">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5364">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5370">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5370">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5371">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5371">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5376">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5376">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5377">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5377">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5378">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5378">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5379">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5379">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span></span>

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5380">马耳他身份卡片号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5380">Malta identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5381">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5381">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5382">七位数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5382">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5383">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5383">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5384">七位数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5384">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5385">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5385">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5386">在 "M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z" (不区分大小写中的一个字母) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5386">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5387">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5387">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5388">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5388">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5389">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5389">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5390">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5390">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5391">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5391">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5392">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5392">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5393">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5393">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5394">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5394">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5400">kodiċi numerali personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5400">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5406">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5406">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5407">个人数字代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5407">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5408">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5408">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5409">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5409">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5410">uniqueidentityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5410">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5411">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5411">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5412">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5412">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5413">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5414">七位数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5414">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5415">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5416">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5416">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5417">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5418">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5418">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5419">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5420">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5420">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5421">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5421">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5422">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5422">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5423">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5423">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5424">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5424">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5425">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5425">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5426">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5426">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5427">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5427">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5428">numru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5428">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5429">马耳他税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5429">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5430">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5430">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5431">对于马耳他 nationals：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5431">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5432">七个数字和指定模式中的一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5432">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5433">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5433">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5434">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5434">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5435">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5435">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5436">马耳他 nationals：七位数和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5436">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5437">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5437">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5438">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5438">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5439">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5439">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5440">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5440">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5441">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5441">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5442">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5442">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5443">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5443">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5444">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5444">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5445">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5445">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5446">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5446">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5447">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5447">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5448">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5448">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5481">荷兰公民服务 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5481">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5482">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5482">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5483">8-9 个数字，包含可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5483">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5484">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5484">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5485">8-9 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5485">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5486">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5486">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5487">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5487">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5488">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5488">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5489">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5489">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5490">双三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5490">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5491">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5492">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5492">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5493">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5494">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5494">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5495">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5495">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5496">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5496">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5497">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5497">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5498">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5498">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5499">Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5499">Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5500">bsn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5500">bsn#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5516">uniek identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5516">uniek identificatienummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5517">uniek identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5517">uniek identiteitsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5518">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5518">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5519">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5519">unique identity number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5521">荷兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5521">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5522">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5522">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5523">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5524">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5524">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5525">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5525">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5526">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5526">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5527">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5527">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5528">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5528">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5529">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5529">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5530">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5530">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5531">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5531">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5532">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5532">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5550">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5550">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5551">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5551">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5552">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5553">九个字母或数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5553">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5554">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5555">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5555">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5556">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5557">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5557">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5558">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5559">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5559">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5560">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5560">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5561">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5561">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5571">荷兰税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5571">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5572">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5572">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5573">9个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5573">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5574">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5574">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5575">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5575">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5576">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5576">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5577">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5577">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5578">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5578">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5579">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5579">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5580">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5580">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5581">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5581">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5582">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5582">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5583">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5583">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5621">荷兰增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5621">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5622">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5623">14个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5623">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5624">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5625">14个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5625">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5626">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5626">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5627">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5627">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5628">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5628">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5629">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5629">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5630">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5630">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5631">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5631">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5632">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5632">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5633">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5633">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5634">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5634">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5635">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5635">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5636">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5636">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5637">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5637">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5638">找到 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5638">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5639">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5639">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5640">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5640">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5649">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5649">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5650">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5651">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5651">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5652">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5653">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5653">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5654">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5654">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5655">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5655">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5656">三到四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5656">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5657">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5657">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5658">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5658">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5659">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5659">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5660">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5660">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5661">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5661">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5662">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5662">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5663">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5663">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5664">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5664">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5665">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5665">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5666">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5666">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5667">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5667">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5668">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5668">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5669">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5669">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5677">新西兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5677">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5678">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5678">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5679">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5679">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5680">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5680">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5681">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5681">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5682">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5682">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5683">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5683">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5684">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5684">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5685">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5685">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5686">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5686">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5687">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5687">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5688">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5688">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5689">找到 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5689">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5690">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5690">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5691">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5691">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5758">新西兰 inland 收入编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5758">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5759">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5759">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5760">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5760">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5761">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5761">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5762">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5762">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5763">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5763">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5764">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5764">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5765">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5765">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5766">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5766">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5767">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5767">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5768">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5769">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5769">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5770">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5771">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5771">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5772">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5772">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5773">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5773">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5774">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5774">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5775">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5775">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5776">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5776">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5777">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5777">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5778">ird。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5778">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5779">ird no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5779">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5780">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5780">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5781">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5781">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5782">ird 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5782">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5783">inland 收入编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5783">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5784">新新西兰的运行状况号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5784">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5785">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5785">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5786">三个字母、一个空格 (可选) 和四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5786">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5787">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5787">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5788">三个字母 (不区分大小写)  (可选的空格) 四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5788">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5789">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5790">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5790">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5791">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5792">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5793">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5793">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5794">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5794">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5795">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5795">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5796">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5796">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5797">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5797">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5798">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5798">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5799">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5799">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5800">健康</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5800">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5801">治疗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5801">treatment</span></span> 


## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5802">新西兰社会 wlefare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5802">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5803">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5803">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5804">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5804">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5805">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5805">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5806">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5806">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5807">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5807">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5808">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5808">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5809">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5809">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5810">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5810">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5811">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5811">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5812">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5812">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5813">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5813">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5814">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5814">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5815">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5815">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5816">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5816">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5817">找到 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5817">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5818">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5818">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5819">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5819">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5820">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5820">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5821">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5821">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5827">挪威身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5827">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5828">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5828">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5829">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5829">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5830">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5830">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5831">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5831">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5832">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5832">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5833">三位数的个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5833">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5834">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5834">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5835">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5835">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5836">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5836">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5837">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5837">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5838">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5838">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5839">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5839">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5840">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5840">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5841">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5841">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5842">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5842">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5843">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5843">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5844">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5844">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
