#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5846">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5846">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5847">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5847">Personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5848">Norwegian ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5848">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5849">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5849">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5850">Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5850">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5851">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5851">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5852">Fødselsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5852">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5853">菲律宾统一多用途标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5853">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5854">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5854">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5855">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5855">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5856">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5856">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5857">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5857">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5858">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5858">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5859">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5859">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5860">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5860">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5861">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5861">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5862">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5862">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5863">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5863">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5864">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5864">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5865">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5865">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5866">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5866">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5867">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5867">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5868">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5868">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5869">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5869">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5870">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5870">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5871">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5871">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5872">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5872">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5873">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5873">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5874">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5874">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5875">波兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5875">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5876">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5876">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5877">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5877">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5878">14位数，包含2个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5878">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5879">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5879">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5880">14位数和2正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5880">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5881">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5881">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5882">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5882">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5883">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5883">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5884">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5884">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5885">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5885">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5886">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5886">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5887">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5887">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5888">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5888">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5889">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5889">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5890">正则表达式  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5890">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5891">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5891">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5892">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5892">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5893">Keywords_poland_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5893">Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5894">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5894">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5895">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5895">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5896">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5896">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5897">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5897">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5898">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5898">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5899">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5899">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5900">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5900">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5901">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5901">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5902">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5902">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5903">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5903">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5904">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5904">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5905">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5905">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5906">prawo jazdy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5906">prawo jazdy</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5907">波兰恒等卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5907">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5908">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5908">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5909">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5909">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5910">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5910">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5911">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5911">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5912">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5913">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5913">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5914">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5915">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5915">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5916">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5916">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5917">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5917">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5918">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5918">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5919">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5919">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5920">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5920">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5921">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5921">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5922">器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5922">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5923">Nazwa i 器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5923">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5924">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5924">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5925">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5925">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5926">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5926">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5927">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5927">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5928">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5928">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5929">波兰国 ID (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5929">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5930">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5930">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5931">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5931">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5932">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5932">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5933">表示出生日期的6个数字 YYMMDD 格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5933">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5934">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5934">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5935">1校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5935">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5936">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5937">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5937">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5938">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5939">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5939">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5940">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5940">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5941">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5941">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5942">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5942">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5943">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5944">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5944">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5945">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5945">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5951">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5951">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5955">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5955">pesel</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5957">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5957">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5958">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5958">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5959">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5959">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5960">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5960">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5961">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5961">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5962">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5962">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5963">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5963">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5964">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5964">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5965">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5965">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5966">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5966">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5967">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5967">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5968">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5968">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5969">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5969">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5970">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5970">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5971">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5971">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5975">Paszport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5975">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5976">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5976">Poland REGON number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5977">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5977">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5978">9个数字或14个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5978">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5979">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5980">9个数字或14位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5980">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5981">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5981">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5982">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5982">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5983">号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5983">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5984">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5984">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5985">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5985">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5986">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5986">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-5987">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5987">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5988">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5988">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5989">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5989">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5990">找到 Keywords_polish_regon_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5990">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-5991">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5991">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5992">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5992">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-5998">统计否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-5998">statistical no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6002">公司 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6002">company id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6006">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6006">numeru regon</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6009">波兰纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6009">Poland tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6010">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6010">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6011">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6011">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6012">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6012">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6013">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6013">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6014">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6014">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6015">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6015">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6016">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6016">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6017">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6017">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6018">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6018">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6019">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6019">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6049">葡萄牙公民卡片号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6049">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6050">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6050">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6051">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6051">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6052">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6052">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6053">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6053">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6054">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6054">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6055">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6055">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6056">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6056">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6057">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6057">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6058">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6058">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6059">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6059">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6079">葡萄牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6079">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6080">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6080">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6081">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6081">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6082">两个字母后跟指定模式中的七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6082">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6083">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6083">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6084">两个字母后跟七个包含特殊字符的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6084">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6085">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6085">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6086">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6086">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6087">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6087">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6088">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6088">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6089">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6089">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6090">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6090">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6091">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6091">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6092">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6092">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6093">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6093">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6094">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6094">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6095">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6095">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6111">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6111">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6112">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6112">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6113">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6114">一个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6114">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6115">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6116">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6116">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6117">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6117">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6118">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6118">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6119">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6120">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6120">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6121">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6122">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6122">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6123">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6123">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6124">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6124">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6125">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6125">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6126">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6126">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6127">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6127">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6128">葡萄牙语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6128">portuguese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6129">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6129">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6130">número do passaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6130">número do passaporte</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6131">葡萄牙税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6131">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6132">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6133">9个带可选空格的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6133">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6134">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6134">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6135">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6135">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6136">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6136">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6137">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6137">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6138">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6138">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6139">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6139">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6140">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6140">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6141">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6141">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6142">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6142">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6143">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6143">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6144">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6144">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6145">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6145">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6146">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6146">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6147">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6147">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6148">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6148">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6149">Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6149">Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6155">numero 会计</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6155">numero fiscal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6156">tax id

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6172">罗马尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6172">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6173">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6173">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6174">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6175">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6175">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6176">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6177">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6177">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6178">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6178">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6179">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6179">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6180">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6181">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6181">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6182">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6183">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6183">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6184">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6184">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6185">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6185">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6190">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6190">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6191">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6191">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6201">罗马尼亚个人数字代码 (CNP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6201">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6202">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6202">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6203">13位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6203">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6204">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6204">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6205">1-9 的1位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6205">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6206">代表出生日期 (YYMMDD 的6个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6206">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6207">2位数，可以为01-52 或99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6207">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6208">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6208">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6209">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6209">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6210">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6210">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6211">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6211">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6212">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6212">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6213">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6213">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6214">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6214">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6215">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6215">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6216">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6216">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6267">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6267">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6268">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6268">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6269">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6269">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6270">八个或9个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6270">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6271">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6271">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6272">8或9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6272">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6273">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6273">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6274">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6274">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6275">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6275">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6276">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6276">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6277">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6277">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6278">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6278">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_romania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6280">Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6280">Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6285">俄罗斯护照号码（国内）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6285">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6286">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6287">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6287">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6288">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6289">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6289">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6290">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6290">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6291">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6291">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6292">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6292">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6293">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6293">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6294">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6294">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6295">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6296">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6296">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6297">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6298">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6298">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6299">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6299">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6300">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6300">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6305">登记卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6305">passport #</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6313">паспорт#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6313">паспорт#</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6317">俄罗斯护照号码（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6317">Russia passport number international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6318">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6319">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6319">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6320">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6321">9位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6321">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6322">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6322">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6323">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6323">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6324">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6324">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6325">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6325">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6326">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6326">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6327">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6327">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6328">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6328">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6329">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6329">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6330">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6330">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6347">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6347">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6348">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6348">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6349">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6349">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6350">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6350">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6351">10个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6351">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6352">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6353">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6354">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6355">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6355">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6356">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6356">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6357">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6357">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6358">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6358">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6359">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6359">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6360">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6360">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6361">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6361">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6362">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6362">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6363">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6363">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6364">新加坡国家注册标识卡片 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6364">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6365">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6365">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6366">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6366">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6367">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6367">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6368">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6368">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6369">字母 "F"、"G"、"S" 或 "T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6369">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6370">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6370">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6371">字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6371">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6372">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6372">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6373">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6373">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6374">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6374">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6375">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6375">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6376">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6376">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6377">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6377">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6378">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6378">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6379">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6379">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6380">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6380">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6381">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6381">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6392">斯洛伐克驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6392">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6393">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6393">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6394">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6394">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6395">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6395">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6396">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6396">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6397">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6397">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6398">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6398">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6399">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6399">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6400">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6401">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6401">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6402">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6403">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6403">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6404">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6404">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6405">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6405">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6421">斯洛伐克个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6421">Slovakia personal number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6422">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6422">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6423">九或十个数字，包含可选反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6423">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6424">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6424">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6425">代表出生日期的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6425">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6426">可选的斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6426">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6427">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6427">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6428">1可选校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6428">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6429">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6430">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6430">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6431">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6432">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6432">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6433">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6433">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6434">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6434">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6435">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6435">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6436">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6436">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6483">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6483">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6484">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6484">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6485">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6486">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6486">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6487">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6488">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6488">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6489">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6489">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6490">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6490">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6491">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6491">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6492">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6492">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6493">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6493">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6494">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6494">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6497">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6497">passport number</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6501">斯洛文尼亚驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6501">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6502">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6502">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6503">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6503">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6504">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6504">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6505">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6505">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6506">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6506">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6507">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6508">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6508">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6509">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6510">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6510">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6511">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6511">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6512">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6512">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6528">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6528">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6529">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6529">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6530">13位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6530">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6531">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6531">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6532">指定模式中的13个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6532">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6533">与出生日期 (DDMMLLL) 的七位数，其中 "LLL" 对应于出生年份的后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6533">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6534">两个数字，对应于出生区域 "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6534">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6535">三个数字，对应于出生在同一天的人的性别和序列号组合， (000-499 的男和500-999 的插孔) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6535">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6536">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6536">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6537">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6538">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6538">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6539">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6540">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6540">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6541">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6541">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6542">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6542">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6543">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6543">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6544">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6544">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
