## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6572">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6572">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6573">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6573">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6574">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6574">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6575">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6575">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6576">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6576">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6577">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6577">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6578">字母 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6578">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6579">一个大写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6579">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6580">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6580">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6581">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6582">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6582">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6583">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6584">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6584">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6585">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6585">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6586">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6586">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6587">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6587">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6588">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6588">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6593">斯洛文尼亚税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6593">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6594">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6594">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6595">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6595">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6596">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6596">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6597">一个从1-9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6597">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6598">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6598">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6599">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6599">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6600">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6600">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6601">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6601">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6602">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6602">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6603">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6603">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6604">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6604">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6605">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6605">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6606">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6606">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6607">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6607">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6631">南非身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6631">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6632">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6632">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6633">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6633">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6634">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6634">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6635">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6635">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6636">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6636">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6637">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6637">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6638">一位公民指示器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6638">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6639">数字 "8" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6639">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6640">一个数字，是校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6640">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6641">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6641">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6642">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6642">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6643">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6643">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6644">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6644">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6645">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6645">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6646">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6646">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6647">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6647">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6653">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6653">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6654">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6655">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6655">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6656">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6657">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6657">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6658">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6658">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6659">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6659">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6660">由世纪和性别确定的一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6660">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6661">四位数的出生区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6661">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6662">一种用于区分上述号码相同的人员的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6662">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6663">校验位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6663">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6664">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6664">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6665">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6665">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6666">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6666">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6667">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6667">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6668">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6668">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6669">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6669">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6670">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6670">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6671">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6672">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6672">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6673">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6673">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6675">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6675">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6678">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6678">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6679">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6679">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6680">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6680">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6681">西班牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6681">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6682">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6682">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6684">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6684">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6685">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6686">8位数，后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6686">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6687">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6687">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6688">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6688">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6689">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6690">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6690">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6691">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6692">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6692">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6693">函数  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6693">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6694">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6694">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6731">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6731">Spain DNI</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6732">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6733">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6733">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6734">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6735">七位数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6735">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6736">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6736">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6737">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6737">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6738">一个检查信函 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6738">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6739">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6739">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6740">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6740">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6741">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6741">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6742">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6742">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6743">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6743">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6744">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6744">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6745">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6745">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6746">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6746">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6770">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6770">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6771">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6771">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6772">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6772">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6773">八个或九个字符的字母和数字的组合，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6773">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6774">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6774">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6775">字母和数字的八个或九个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6775">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6776">两位数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6776">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6777">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6777">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6778">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6778">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6779">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6779">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6780">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6780">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6781">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6781">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6782">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6782">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6783">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6783">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6784">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6784">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6796"> (SSN) 的西班牙社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6796">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6797">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6797">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6798">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6798">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6799">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6799">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6800">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6800">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6801">11-12 位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6801">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6802">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6802">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6803">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6803">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6804">七到八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6804">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6805">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6805">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6806">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6806">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6807">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6807">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6808">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6808">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6809">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6809">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6810">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6810">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6811">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6811">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6812">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6812">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6813">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6813">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6814">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6814">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6815">西班牙纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6815">Spain tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6816">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6817">七个或8个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6817">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6818">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6819">具有西班牙国家标识卡片的西班牙语自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6819">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6820">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6820">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6821">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6821">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6822">不包含西班牙国家的非居民 Spaniards 国家标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6822">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6823">一个大写的字母 "L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6823">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6824">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6824">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6825">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6825">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6826">在没有西班牙国内身份证的14年年龄下的居民 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6826">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6827">一个大写的字母 "K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6827">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6828">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6828">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6829">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6829">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6830">带有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6830">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6831">一个大写的字母，为 "X"、"Y" 或 "Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6831">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6832">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6832">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6833">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6833">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6834">没有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6834">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6835">一个大写字母为 "M" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6835">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6836">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6836">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6837">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6837">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6838">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6838">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6839">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6839">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6840">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6840">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6841">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6841">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6842">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6842">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6843">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6843">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6844">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6844">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6845">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6845">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6876">SQL Server 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6876">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6877">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6877">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6878">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6878">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6879">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6879">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6880">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6880">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6881">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6881">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6882">字符串 "Password" 或 "pwd"，其中 "pwd" 不以小写字母开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6882">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6883">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6883">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6884">不是美元符号 ($) 的任何字符、百分比符号 (% ) 、大于符号 ( # A0) 、符号 ( @ ) 、引号 ( ") 、分号 (、) 、左大括号 ( [) 或左括号 ( {) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6884">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6885">7-128 个不是分号的字符的任意组合 (; ) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6885">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6886">分号 (; ) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6886">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6887">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6887">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6888">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6888">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6889">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6889">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6890">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6890">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6891">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6891">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6892">找 **不** 到 CEP_GlobalFilter 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6892">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6893">正则表达式 **CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6893">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6894">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6894">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6895">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6895">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6896">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6896">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6897">部分密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6897">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6898">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6898">somepassword</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6922">瑞典驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6922">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6923">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6923">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6924">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6924">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6925">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6925">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6926">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6926">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6927">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6927">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6928">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6928">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6929">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6929">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6930">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6930">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6931">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6932">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6932">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6933">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6934">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6934">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6935">正则表达式  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6935">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6936">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6936">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6938">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6938">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6941">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6941">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6942">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6942">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6943">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6943">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6944">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6944">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6945">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6945">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6946">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6946">driver's license</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6952">瑞典国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6952">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6953">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6953">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6954">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6954">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6955">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6956">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6956">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6957">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6957">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6958">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6958">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6959">"-" 或 "+" 的分隔符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6959">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6960">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6960">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6961">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6961">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6962">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6962">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6963">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6963">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6964">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6964">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6965">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6965">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6966">找到了 from 关键字 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6966">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6967">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6967">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6968">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6968">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6969">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6969">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6970">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6970">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6989">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6989">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6990">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6990">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6991">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6991">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6992">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6992">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6993">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6993">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6994">八个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6994">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6995">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6995">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6996">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6996">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-6997">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6997">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-6998">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6998">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-6999">正则表达式 Regex_sweden_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-6999">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7000">满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7000">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7001">找到 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7001">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7002">找到 Keyword_sweden_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7002">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7003">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7003">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_sweden_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7004">Keyword_sweden_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7004">Keyword_sweden_passport</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7033">瑞典社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7033">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7034">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7034">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7035">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7035">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7036">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7036">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7037">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7037">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7038">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7038">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7039">对应于出生日期 (YYYYMMDD) 的8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7039">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7040">与序列号对应的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7040">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7041">序列号中的最后一个数字指示在为 "男" 分配一个奇数号码时的性别，以及一个 "女" 的偶数号码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7041">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7042">最多1990，将序列号 corresponded 分配给那些号码的持有者出生或 (的县。如果在 1947) 之前出生，则根据纳税记录在年1月1日的) 使用特殊代码 (通常为9的 immigrants 的1947第七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7042">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7043">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7043">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7044">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7044">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7045">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7045">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7046">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7046">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7047">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7047">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7048">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7048">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7049">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7049">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7050">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7050">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7051">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7051">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7067">瑞典纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7067">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7068">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7068">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7069">10个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7069">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7070">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7070">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7071">10个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7071">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7072">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7072">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7073">正号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7073">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7074">在以下位置使标识号唯一的三个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7074">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7075">对于在1990之前发出的号码，第七和第八位数字标识出生的县或外部人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7075">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7076">第九个位置中的数字表示为奇数或甚至是女的性别</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7076">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7077">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7077">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7078">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7078">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7079">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7079">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7080">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7080">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7081">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7081">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7082">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7082">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7083">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7083">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7084">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7085">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7085">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7111">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7111">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7112">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7112">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7113">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7113">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7114">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7114">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7115">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7115">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7116">四个字母的银行代码 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7116">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7117">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7117">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7118">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7118">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7119">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7119">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7120">BBAN 的余数 (1 到3个字母或数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7120">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7121">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7122">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7122">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7123">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7124">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7125">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7125">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7126">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7126">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swiss-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7160">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7160">Swiss SSN AHV number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7161">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7161">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7162">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7162">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7163">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7163">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7164">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7164">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7165">三位数-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7165">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7166">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7166">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7167">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7167">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7168">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7168">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7169">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7169">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7170">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7170">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7171">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7171">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7172">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7173">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7173">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7174">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7175">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7175">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7176">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7176">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7177">找到 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7177">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7178">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7178">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7179">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7179">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7199">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>

   
## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7200">台湾国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7200">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7201">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7201">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7202">一个英文)  (，后跟9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7202">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7203">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7203">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7204">一个英文字母 (，后跟9个数字) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7204">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7205">一个英文字母 (，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7205">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7206">数字 "1" 或 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7206">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7207">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7207">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7208">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7208">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7209">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7209">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7210">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7210">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7211">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7211">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7212">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7212">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7213">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7213">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7214">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7214">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7215">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7215">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7216">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7216">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7217">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7227">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7227">身份證號</span></span>
