## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7234">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7234">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7235">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7235">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7236">生物识别护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7236">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7237">不带生物的护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7237">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7238">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7238">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7239">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7239">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7240">字符 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7240">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7241">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7241">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7242">不带生物的护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7242">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7243">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7243">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7244">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7244">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7245">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7245">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7246">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7246">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7247">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7247">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7248">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7248">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7249">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7249">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7250">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7250">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7251">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7251">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7252">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7252">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7253">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7253">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7254">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7254">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7255">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7255">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7256">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7256">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7257">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7257">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7258">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7258">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7259">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7259">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7260">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7260">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7261">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7261">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7262">10个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7262">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7263">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7263">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7264">10个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7264">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7265">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7265">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7266">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7266">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7267">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7268">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7268">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7269">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7270">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7270">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7271">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7271">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7272">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7272">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7273">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7273">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7274">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7274">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7275">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7275">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7276">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7276">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7277">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7277">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7278">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7278">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7279">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7279">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7280">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7280">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7281">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7281">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7282">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7282">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7283">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7283">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7284">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7284">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7285">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7285">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7286">泰语填充标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7286">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7287">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7287">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7288">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7288">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7289">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7289">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7290">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7290">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7291">第一个数字不是零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7291">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7292">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7292">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7293">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7294">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7294">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7295">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7296">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7296">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7297">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7297">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7298">找到 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7298">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7299">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7300">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7300">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7302">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7302">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7303">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7303">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7304">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7304">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7305">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7305">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7306">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7306">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7307">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7307">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7308">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7308">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7309">土耳其国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7309">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7310">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7310">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7311">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7311">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7312">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7312">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7313">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7313">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7314">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7314">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7315">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7315">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7316">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7316">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7317">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7317">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7318">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7318">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7319">找到 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7319">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7320">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7320">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7321">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7321">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7322">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7322">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7323">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7323">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7324">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7324">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7325">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7325">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7326">Vatandaşlık numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7326">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7327">Vatandaşlık no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7327">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7328">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7328">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7329">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7329">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7330">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7330">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7331">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7332">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7332">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7333">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7334">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7334">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7335">5个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7335">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7336">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7336">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7337">日期格式 MMDDY 中的五个数字。出生日期 (第七个字符将增加50如果驱动程序是女，即51到62而不是01到 12) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7337">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7338">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7338">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7339">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7339">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7340">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7341">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7341">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7342">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7343">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7343">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7344">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7344">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7345">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7345">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7346">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7346">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7356">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7356">motorcycles</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7361">driving licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7361">driving licences</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7362">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7362">driving licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7363">dual control car</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7363">dual control car</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7364">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7364">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7365">electoral 卷号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7365">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7366">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7367">两个字母后跟1-4 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7367">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7368">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7369">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后接1-4 个号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7369">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7370">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7371">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7371">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7372">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7373">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7373">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7374">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7374">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7375">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7375">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7376">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7376">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7377">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7377">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7382">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7382">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7383">国家/地区运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7383">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7384">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7384">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7385">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7385">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7386">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7386">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7387">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7387">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7388">3个或10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7388">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7389">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7389">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7390">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7390">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7391">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7391">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7392">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7392">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7393">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7393">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7394">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7394">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7395">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7395">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7396">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7396">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7397">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7397">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7398">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7398">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7399">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7399">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7400">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7400">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7401">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7401">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7402">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7402">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7403">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7403">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7404">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7404">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7405">national health service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7405">national health service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7407">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7407">health services authority</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7408">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7408">health authority</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7410">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7410">patient id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7413">patient number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7413">patient number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7414">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7414">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7415">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7415">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7416">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7416">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7417">D. B。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7417">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7418">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7418">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7419">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7419">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7420">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7420">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7421">国内保险号 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7421">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7422">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区 Identificaiton 号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7422">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7423">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7423">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7424">由空格或短划线分隔的七个字符或九个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7424">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7425">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7425">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7426">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7426">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7427"> (有效 NINOs 的两个字母仅使用此前缀中的特定字符，此格式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7427">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7428">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7428">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7429">"A"、"B"、"C" 或 "d" (类似于前缀，后缀中只允许有某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7429">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7430">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7430">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7431">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7431">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7432">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7432">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7433">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7433">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7434">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7434">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7435">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7435">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7436">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7436">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7437">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7437">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7438">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7438">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7439">要么是 "A"、"B"、"C"，要么 ' d '</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7439">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7440">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7440">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7441">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7441">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7442">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7442">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7443">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7443">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7444">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7444">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7445">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7445">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7446">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7446">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7447">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7447">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7448">未找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7448">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7470">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7470">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7471">唯一的纳税人参考号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7471">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7472">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7472">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7473">10个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7473">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7474">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7474">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7475">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7475">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7476">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7476">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7477">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7477">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7478">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7478">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7479">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7479">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7480">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7480">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7481">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7481">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7501">美国银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7501">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7502">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7502">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7503">8-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7503">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7504">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7504">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7505">8-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7505">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7506">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7506">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7507">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7507">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7508">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7508">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7509">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7509">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7510">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7510">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7511">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7511">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7541">美国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7541">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7542">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7542">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7543">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7543">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7544">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7544">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7545">取决于状态-例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7545">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7546">与 ddd ddd ddd 相匹配的9个数字的格式将会匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7546">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7547">9个数字（如 ddddddddd）将不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7547">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7548">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7548">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7549">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7549">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7550">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7550">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7551">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7551">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7552">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7552">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7553">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7553">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7554">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7554">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7555">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7555">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7556">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7556">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7557">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7557">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7558">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7558">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7559">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7559">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7657">美国单个纳税人标识号 (ITIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7657">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7658">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7659">九个数字，以 "9" 开头，并包含 "7" 或 "8" 作为第四个数字，可以选择使用空格或短划线进行格式设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7659">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7660">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7661">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7661">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7662">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7662">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7663">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7663">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7664">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7664">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7665">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7665">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7666">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7666">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7667">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7667">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7668">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7668">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7669">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7669">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7670">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7670">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7671">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7671">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7672">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7672">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7673">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7673">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7674">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7675">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7675">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7676">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7677">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7677">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7678">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7678">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7679">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7679">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7680">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7680">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7681">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7681">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7682">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7682">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7683">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7683">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7684">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7684">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7685">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7685">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7686">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7686">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7687">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7687">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7688">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7688">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7689">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7689">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7710"> (SSN) 的美国社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7710">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7711">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7711">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7712">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7712">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7713">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7713">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7714">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7715">四个函数在四种不同的模式中查找 Ssn：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7715">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7716">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7716">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7717">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7717">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7718">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7718">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7719">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7719">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7720">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7720">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7721">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7721">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7722">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7722">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7723">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7723">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7724">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7724">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7725">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7725">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7726">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7726">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7727">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7727">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7728">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7728">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7729">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7729">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7730">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7730">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7731">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7731">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7732">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7732">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7733">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7733">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7734">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7734">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7735">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7735">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7736">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7736">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7740">社会保障#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7740">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7741">社会保障号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7741">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7742">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7742">Social Security#</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7749">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7749">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7750">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7750">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7751">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7751">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7752">护照号敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7752">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7753">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7753">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7754">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7754">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7755">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7755">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7756">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7756">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7757">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7757">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7758">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7758">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7759">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7759">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7760">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7760">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7761">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7761">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7762">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7762">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7763">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7763">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7764">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7764">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7765">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7765">Passport Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7766">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7766">Passport No</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7767">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7767">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7768">登记卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7768">Passport#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7769">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7769">PassportID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7770">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7770">Passportno</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7771">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7771">passportnumber</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7772">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7772">パスポート</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7773">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7773">パスポート番号</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7783">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7783">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7784">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7784">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7785">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7785">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7786">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7786">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7787">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7787">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7788">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7789">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7789">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7790">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7791">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7791">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7792">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7792">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7793">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7793">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7796">乌克兰护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7796">ukraine passport</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7802">乌克兰护照（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7802">Ukraine passport international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7803">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7803">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7804">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7804">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7805">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7805">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7806">八个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7806">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7807">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7807">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7808">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7808">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7809">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7809">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7810">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7810">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6570b-7811">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7811">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6570b-7812">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7812">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7813">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7813">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6570b-7814">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6570b-7814">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
